scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev -w apps/backend" "npm run dev -w apps/frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/backend && npm run build -w apps/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/backend && npm run lint -w apps/frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w apps/backend && npm run typecheck -w apps/frontend
